data.title: Sean Penn's Divorce From Leila George Signals Ironclad Prenup In Place, Estranged Wife Asks Judge To 'Terminate' Spousal Support
data.meta_description: The actress has asked the judge to "terminate" spousal support on both sides.
data.text:
According to legal documents, George — whose real name is Leila George D'Onofrio — has asked the judge to "terminate" spousal support for both parties. Meaning, she doesn't want to collect from her 61-year-old Academy Award-winning ex and doesn't want to give him a penny either.

RadarOnline.com obtained photos of the I Am Sam actor taken on October 19 that showed him sporting the metal ring on that finger. The wedding ring wasn't the only bizarre thing about the pictures.

Penn also looked stressed and was spotted puffing on a cigarette while seemingly having an intense conversation with a guy in a suit.
